captions.text: Now's the time for a new story by Papy Grenier
Aaah, kids! It's been a while...
Humm Grandpa... Look up. I'm here.
I just came back from the prefecture.
Oh shit! It's really been a long time since then...
...Alright, I let you take care of the kids for the day. See you later, ok?
GrandPapy Grenier! Hey Grandfather! GrandPapy!
Ahhh Kids... Just call me "papy", it will be easier for the next videos...
Papy Papy, can you tell us a story?
Aaah.. A story... Did I already talk about the time when I was...
Damn you! Not a word! They will call the cops!
But, who are you?!
I'm the voice in your mind which prevents you from going mad!
Is that true?! Ah.. Thank you then...
Eh shut up! We will be spotted!
Aaa! True! Hush!
Hello... rustic three-cheese pizza delivery, is it the correct place?
NO, I said I hate children!
Anyway! Instead, have I told you the time when I was the Jesus of the space?
It was in 2007, long before Electronic Arts became a drug cartel!
It all began  during a routine mission when I accidentally touched an alien beacon..
It gave me weird flashbacks.
I did not understand their meaning. Luckily, my crew was here to help me.
Shepard, your species is not sufficiently advanced to understand these visions.
Eh?
Let me help you... But I need to go straight into your mind first to see your past.
Your species is not sufficiently advanced to understand these visions.
Damn it, Shepard! Just focus!
I get there... I see...
It's violent! I see...Something brutal.
It's unclear. But... Oh come on!
Hey wait... Shepard?! You are baking a cheese gratin !
Me, I was the Commander. I was the one in charge and it was me who always decided what we were doing and where the ship had to go.
Commander, let it go! You do any old thing... Stop that!
No! I do what I want! I decide! And we are going straight into the sun!
Oh god why?! *what?!* At least, give me back the throttles! Fuu!
I think I'm going to throw up!
Papy, let's be serious!
oooh come on...
Anyway, after research, we discovered a mechanical species - extremely expensive to show on screen -
which wanted to wipe out all life in the galaxy.
We do not have the means to animate a giant robot, so be imaginative!
We are "les Moissonneurs". You would be afraid if our French name was not so ridiculous...
All these things were complicated for a lowly soldier like me.
First of all, we wwere just three. Me, Ashley and Kaidan.
Poor Kaidan... We were not able to do something to save him...
Shepard, you must choose between Ashley and Kaidan, you can not save both!
I must choose between Kaidan or... *youhouu*
Ashley!
Commandant Shepard! Go help Kaidan. I'm fine... In fact, I'm not even in danger.
Ashley! I'm coming!
Hello? Kaidan here, I'm near your position, I killed all enemies, are you now coming to get me?
Oh my god, he has lost his mind. It's the fever! Joker, start the ship!
Eh! Oh oh? Eh!
♪ Little guy saved by nobody. ♪
♪ Little guy that you let down. ♪
♪ Little guy that everyone has forgotten. ♪
♪ This little guy, it's Kaidan! ♪ *Bah...eh!!*
Listen to me! I know you are upset by the death of Kaidan.
Kaidan... You know who he is. The guy who... oh nevermind!
But, remember! We are a team.
Throughout my adventures, to help me during all the battles, I had found the best squadmates possible.
They had all their abilities, their features and I will never forget them.
Ashley, of course, never used again after Mass Effect 1. *hey!*
Garrus! - Call me "Archangel", that's my nickname on Origin.
Liara, an Asari with biotic powers.
Hey Liara, do all Asari have biotic powers?
Absolutely not!
So, biotic powers are not automatic! Haha ha ha ha ha...
Tali, I loved her smile!
Kasumi, 5.99€ on Origin!
Seb! Hi! Actually, I'm not in this video because...
Miranda! A genetically PERFECT human being.
Legion! A Geth acquired to our cause.
♪ Hi it's me Legion, I'm the cute robot, with Garrus, we fight Cerberus! ♪ *spaaaaaaace*
And there were also all the others who would be too expensive to craft in cosplay.
And all the ones we meet in the ship without even talking to them because we don't care.
Commander? Why is the ship called Normandy 2?
And do you know what I was thinking while seeing all these people?
Which ones am I gonna bang?
And then, Papy,  did you go fight against the villains?
Yes we did, but before, we had more important missions to complete.
Shepard, we have a galaxy to save!
Listen Garrus, I'm doing a very important thing ok?
I need food for my goldfish and... I want the hamster... please.
Shepard, you are expected aboard the Normandy.
Listen Miranda! I AM COMMANDER SHEPARD... And this is my favorite store on the Citadel!
And to think that I left my people to help this man...
Joking aside, we have experienced many things, fights, space battles
and I was always in frontline.
Are you fucking kidding me Shepard? It's right in the middle of the battlefield!
I say: GO THERE!
Damn it, idiot!
During all these adventures, we have encountered many enemies all more dangerous than the others...
Tremble organic races! We are the "Moissonneurs" and we are coming with our army, the... "re"... the "recolteurs"...
Oh man... switch the game to English !
But also a few allies, not really reliable!
Hi! I'm the Illusive Man! he? *what?* *what did he say?*
The Illusive man! *eh?* Did you understand?!*what?* M'fucker...
Finally, we managed to unite all species of the galaxy for the final battle!
And I successfully managed to infiltrate the Citadel, where the enemy's weak point was.
Because, they were nice, they had planned three weak points so we can kill them.
In any case, I would finally understand the Reapers' real purpose...
You, organic races, are building machines who will destroy you in the future.
So, in order save you, we prefer to kill you before this happens.
Yeah, okay, said this way, it seems stupid! But we have really been thinking about it for a long time!
The fate of the humanity is in your hands, and the End will depend to your choice.
You can choose one among these three endings! The first one is the "control ending".
Are you ready to become a Reaper?!
The second one is the "synthesis ending": your soul will merge with the Citadel!
The third one is the "destroy ending", which will stop the cycle.
What will you choose? Are you ready?!
Now, three, two, one... IT'S UP TO YOU!
To the right? There?! Lef... middle? Middle? Mi... Middle!?
Shepard? ... Shepard?! Are you AFK?
I should go....
And that's exactly how it happened! Well, until the extended cut version...
Papy, that is not a story, that's a video game!
What do you mean? So that means that Kaidan is still alive?! Ah! Bastard!
Papy Papy, can you tell us another story?
Oh, of course, but it will be next time!
***Translation by Thibault Lizé (Samus Copslay / TL Prod) ***

***Editing Translation by Maxence Giraudet (Nyhgault) & Kevin Ménard*** 
(Thanks for you help dudes!)
